| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line305](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line305 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A **static blob**, b, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is a [blob](/wiki/Blob "Blob") that has an electrified body.

A static blob has a shocking touch attack and a passive shock attack, and possesses [poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance") and [shock resistance](/wiki/Shock_resistance "Shock resistance").

Eating a static blob [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") has a 2⁄5 chance each of conveying poison resistance or shock resistance.

## Generation

Randomly generated static blobs are always generated hostile. Static blobs will not randomly generate in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").

## Encyclopedia entry

- *See the [encyclopedia entry for amoeboid](/wiki/Amoeboid#Encyclopedia_entry "Amoeboid").*

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Static_blob\&action=edit)*

html:
Static blob

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
b static blob
Difficulty 14
Attacks Touch 3d8 shock, Passive 3d4 shock
b static blob
Difficulty 14
Attacks

Touch 3d8 shock, Passive 3d4 shock

Base level 12
Base experience 306
Speed 6
Base AC 8
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 200
Nutritional value 100
Size Large
Resistances sleep, poison, electricity
Resistances conveyed poison (40%), electricity (40%)

A static blob:

  • has no eyes.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • is mindless.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • wanders randomly.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line305

A static blob, b, is a type of monster that appears in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and Hack'EM. It is a blob that has an electrified body.

A static blob has a shocking touch attack and a passive shock attack, and possesses poison resistance, sleep resistance and shock resistance.

Eating a static blob corpse or tin has a 2⁄5 chance each of conveying poison resistance or shock resistance.

Generation

Randomly generated static blobs are always generated hostile. Static blobs will not randomly generate in Gehennom.

Encyclopedia entry

See the encyclopedia entry for amoeboid.
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Static_blob&oldid=164234"

A '''static blob''', {{monsym|static blob}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]], [[SlashTHEM]] and [[Hack'EM]]. It is a [[blob]] that has an electrified body.

A static blob has a shocking touch attack and a passive shock attack, and possesses [[poison resistance]], [[sleep resistance]] and [[shock resistance]].

Eating a static blob [[corpse]] or [[tin]] has a {{frac|2|5}} chance each of conveying poison resistance or shock resistance.

==Generation==
Randomly generated static blobs are always generated hostile. Static blobs will not randomly generate in [[Gehennom]].
